creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: wide blue border surrounds a large rectangle bordered by cross stitch band in red, green, blue; center--red background in scrolled and circle pattern--green, yellow and blue; lower section: border has similar scrolled pattern; same colors; center has two squares of embroidery surrounded by black; indigo lining
title: Baby Carrier
